landing.heroDescription: No more complex timeline editing. Cut and manage videos with text. ClipNote makes your video workflow 10x faster.
landing.whyClipNoteDesc: A new experience beyond traditional editing tools
landing.feature1Desc: Gemini AI automatically finds key moments and highlights in your videos.
landing.feature2Desc: Write text instead of dragging timelines to precisely set clip ranges.
landing.feature3Desc: Instantly preview without rendering the original file using seekTo technology.
landing.feature4Desc: High-speed FFmpeg rendering exports only the parts you need.
landing.step1Desc: Just paste a YouTube or streaming replay link. No download required.
landing.step2Desc: Select the segments you need from AI-analyzed content using text.
landing.step3Desc: One button click saves your selected segments as high-quality video files.
landing.pricingDesc: Start with transparent and fair pricing
landing.ctaTitle: Turn your videos into personal notes now
landing.ctaDesc: New users get 60 minutes of free analysis credits.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage your video projects and track your analysis credits.
dashboard.projectCount: You have {count, plural, =1 {# active project} other {# active projects}}.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Manage and edit all your video projects.

projectCard.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The project "{title}" and all clip data will be permanently deleted.

pointsPage.title: Points Management
pointsPage.description: Manage and recharge your AI analysis credits.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.name: Name
settingsPage.deleteAccountDesc: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data.

emptyState.title: No projects yet
emptyState.description: Get started by adding a YouTube or Chzzk video URL. AI will analyze the content and help you edit faster.

newProject.title: New Project
newProject.description: Enter a video URL to start analyzing. We support YouTube and Chzzk.
newProject.autoTitle: Leave empty to auto-fetch the video title.
newProject.unsupportedPlatform: Only YouTube and Chzzk URLs are supported

editor.aiDescription: Let AI find the highlights for you automatically
editor.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The project "{title}" and all clip data will be permanently deleted.

clipList.title: Clip List
clipList.emptyHint: Add timestamps in your notes to automatically create clips

share.title: Share Clips
share.embedHint: Paste this code into your website or blog.
share.deleteWarning: Deleting the share link will make it inaccessible.
share.startSharingDescription: Create a share link to let anyone view your clips. You can also embed them on other sites!
share.noClips: No clips available. Add timestamps to your notes first.

sharePage.title: Shared Clips
sharePage.clipNotFoundDesc: The shared link you requested does not exist or has been deleted.

export.title: Export Clips
export.description: Download {count, plural, =1 {# clip} other {# clips}} and merge into a single video
export.step1Desc: Download {count, plural, =1 {# clip} other {# clips}} individually
export.step3Desc: Combine all clips into one video

notesEditor.placeholder:
Enter timestamps for the parts you want to clip.

Example:
0:30 - 1:45 Intro
2:00 - 3:30 Highlight

Tip: Press Ctrl+T to insert the current playback timestamp.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occurred. If the problem persists, please contact support.

notFound.subtitle: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

meta.title: ClipNote - AI Video Clipping Service
meta.description: Edit videos with text notes using AI analysis
